name: Candy Lollipops Match 3
description:
Candy Lollipop game is a quick nice&clean match-3 game, fast to start and great to kill time anywhere.

This game is difference from another, you can match more than 3 candies, the more you make more score and time you get.

The game has wonderful and cheerful background music, lovely and creative sweetest candy, harmless to children, very
yummy chocolate ball and colorful lollipop. If you see jamed cookies, don't let it go and crush them as fast as you can to get bonus.

This candy lollipop game would help you to remind your luscious dream once you have when you were young.

Candy Lollipop game play：

- Drag a line to connect and match 3 or more sweet candies
- 60 seconds time limited
- Gain time by creating super combo
- Match 4 or more sweet candy to gain bonus
- Match 7 candies to create the super combo,give you a greater reward
- The following is a cookie cake, crushed above the candy can be collected yummy cookies

Candy Lollipop game features:

- new way of match 3 game
- Quick and easy to get started
- Lovely and powerful game asset
- Wifi Free
- Totally free
